Directions: Cook macaroni according to package directions. Meanwhile, in a saucepan, cook beef over medium heat until no longer pink; drain. Stir in soup, tomato sauce, onion, parsley, salt and oregano; heat through. Drain macaroni; top with the beef mixture and sprinkle with cheese.
Ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed tomato soup, undiluted
